pieces

Class Knight

  • java.lang.Object
    • pieces.Piece
      • pieces.Knight

  • public class Knight
extends Piece
    The Knight class is an extension of the Piece class and creates a Knight Piece.
    Author:
    Deep Kotadia, Chinmoyi Bhushan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Knight(java.lang.String value) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isMoveValid(java.lang.String oldPos, java.lang.String newPos)
      isMoveValid takes in the src, destination of the piece's move and returns true if it is a valid move for Knight.
      boolean isPathEmpty(java.lang.String oldPos, java.lang.String newPos)
      isPathEmpty function to check if the path b/w the src and dest is empty, it is extended by the subclasses to check their own paths.
      void move(java.lang.String oldPos, java.lang.String newPos, char promopiece)
      move implements the actual movement, here the Knight moves from its src to the position specified

    • Method Detail

      • isMoveValid

        public boolean isMoveValid(java.lang.String oldPos,
                           java.lang.String newPos)
        isMoveValid takes in the src, destination of the piece's move and returns true if it is a valid move for Knight.
        Overrides:
        isMoveValid in class Piece
        Parameters:
        oldPos - is the position the piece is trying to move from
        newPos - is the position the piece is trying to move to
        Returns:
        true if the move is valid and false otherwise.

      • move

        public void move(java.lang.String oldPos,
                 java.lang.String newPos,
                 char promopiece)
        move implements the actual movement, here the Knight moves from its src to the position specified
        Overrides:
        move in class Piece
        Parameters:
        oldPos - is the src of the current Knight Piece
        newPos - is the destination for the current Knight Piece
        promopiece - required in Pawn's case.

      • isPathEmpty

        public boolean isPathEmpty(java.lang.String oldPos,
                           java.lang.String newPos)
        Description copied from class: Piece
        isPathEmpty function to check if the path b/w the src and dest is empty, it is extended by the subclasses to check their own paths.
        Overrides:
        isPathEmpty in class Piece
        Parameters:
        oldPos - old position
        newPos - new position
        Returns:
        true if path empty and false otherwise
